     \lstick{\ket{0}} & \gate{S} & \ctrl{1} & \gate{Z} & \qw & \ctrl{2} & \gate{V} & \meter&\rstick{\hat{p}}\push{\rule{5em}{0em}} \\

     \lstick{\ket{0}} & \gate{S} & \gate{V} & \gate{Z} & \ctrl{0} & \ctrl{0} &\gate{Z}  & \meter&\rstick{\hat{p}}\push{\rule{5em}{0em}} \\
     \lstick{\ket{0}} & \gate{S} & \gate{Z} & \qw & \gate{Z} & \gate{Z} & \qw  & \meter &\rstick{\hat{p}}\push{\rule{5em}{0em}}
}
